page.title: 11CHANGING TIMES,WEST KILBRIDE
page.content: In recent years life has changed in West kilbride, mainly because of new businesses in the area and because of changing fashions.{More people}have decided to live in West Kilbride and {new shops}have sprung up around the town. A lot of houses have been built on what was farmland - this is because the population is increasing rapidly (at present 4900). Recently,{major {improvments}have been carried out on the A78(T) Road between Fairlie and West Kilbride because of new developments at{Hunterston Iron Ore {Complex. Most people have to{travel to {surrounding towns to find work}in the large factories or offices. {Unemployment,}especially among young people, has been rising steadily. The only work available in the village is in shops, hotels and garages.
